notes: Root cause: Tests run in single-process mode (no -n flag) creating only .coverage file, but coverage combine step expects multiple .coverage.* files from parallel execution. Recommended solution: Remove the combine step from workflow since it's unnecessary for single-process test execution.

storyTitle: Fix Coverage Combine Step in CI/CD Workflow

notes: Successfully removed the unnecessary coverage combine step. Tests run in single-process mode creating only one .coverage file, so the combine command was both unnecessary and causing failures. The coverage threshold check will now run correctly using the single .coverage file directly.
